calculationId.description: The unique identifier of the calculation.

calculationTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when the calculation was performed in ISO8601 UTC format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

requestedBy.description: The requestor of the calculation. Currently agent will default to customer until it can be supported.

taxYear.description: The tax year the calculation was requested for. Must conform to the format: YYYY-YY.

totalIncomeTaxAndNicsDue.description: The total amount of Income Tax and National Insurance Contributions due. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

intentToSubmitFinalDeclaration.description: A boolean to indicate whether the calculation can be used to make a final declaration. The value must be true or false.

finalDeclaration.description: A boolean to indicate whether the calculation has been used to make a final declaration. The value must be true or false.

finalDeclarationTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when the final calculation was performed, in ISO8601 UTC format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description:
A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource
The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint
